trans-unit.source: Stores a set of four integers that represent the location and size of a rectangle
trans-unit.target: Armazena um conjunto de quatro inteiros que representam o local e o tamanho de um retângulo

trans-unit.source: A rectangle is defined by its <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height%2A>, and upper-left corner represented by the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Location%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo é definido por seu <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height%2A>e o canto superior esquerdo representado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Location%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To draw rectangles, you need a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object and a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar retângulos, é necessário um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto e um <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object provides the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A> method, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object stores features of the line, such as color and width.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto fornece o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A> método e o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> objeto armazena recursos da linha, como cor e largura.

trans-unit.source: The units the rectangle is drawn in is determined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> properties of the graphics object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: As unidades que o retângulo é desenhado em é determinado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> propriedades dos gráficos de objeto usado para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The default unit is pixels.
trans-unit.target: A unidade padrão é pixels.

trans-unit.source: To draw a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> filled with color, you need a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object and an object derived from <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> such as <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> or <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar uma <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> preenchida com cor, é necessário um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto e um objeto derivam de <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> como <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> ou <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object provides the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRectangle%2A> method and the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> object provides the color and fill information.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto fornece o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRectangle%2A> método e o <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> objeto fornece as informações de cor e preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: For more advanced shapes, use a <xref:System.Drawing.Region> object.
trans-unit.target: Para formas mais avançadas, use um <xref:System.Drawing.Region> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following example draws a rectangle with its upper-left corner at (10, 10).
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir desenha um retângulo com seu canto superior esquerdo em (10, 10).

trans-unit.source: The rectangle has a width of 100 and a height of 50.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo tem uma largura de 100 e uma altura de 50.

trans-unit.source: The second argument passed to the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.%23ctor%2A> constructor indicates that the pen width is 5 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O segundo argumento passado para o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.%23ctor%2A> construtor indica que a largura da caneta é de 5 pixels.

trans-unit.source: When the rectangle is drawn, the pen is centered on the rectangle's boundary.
trans-unit.target: Quando o retângulo é desenhado, a caneta é centralizada no limite do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Because the pen width is 5, the sides of the rectangle are drawn 5 pixels wide, such that 1 pixel is drawn on the boundary itself, 2 pixels are drawn on the inside, and 2 pixels are drawn on the outside.
trans-unit.target: Como a largura da caneta é 5, os lados do retângulo são desenhados com 5 pixels de largura, de forma que 1 pixel é desenhado no próprio limite, 2 pixels são desenhados no interior e 2 pixels são desenhados fora.

trans-unit.source: For more details on pen alignment, see [How to: Set Pen Width and Alignment](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-set-pen-width-and-alignment.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais detalhes sobre o alinhamento de caneta, consulte [Como definir a largura e alinhamento da caneta](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-set-pen-width-and-alignment.md).

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the resulting rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra o retângulo resultante.

trans-unit.source: The dotted lines show where the rectangle would have been drawn if the pen width had been one pixel.
trans-unit.target: As linhas pontilhadas mostram onde o retângulo deveria ser desenhado se a largura da caneta tivesse um pixel.

trans-unit.source: The enlarged view of the upper-left corner of the rectangle shows that the thick black lines are centered on those dotted lines.
trans-unit.target: A exibição ampliada do canto superior esquerdo do retângulo mostra que as linhas pretas espessas são centralizadas nessas linhas pontilhadas.

trans-unit.source: ![Pens](~/add/media/pens1.gif "Pens")
trans-unit.target: ![Canetas](~/add/media/pens1.gif "canetas")

trans-unit.source: The example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo é projetado para uso com o Windows Forms e requer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`, que é um parâmetro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> class with the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> com o local e o tamanho especificados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the upper-left corner of the rectangular region.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que representa o canto superior esquerdo da região retangular.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the width and height of the rectangular region.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa a largura e a altura da região retangular.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> class with the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> com o local e o tamanho especificados.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada X do canto superior esquerdo do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do canto superior esquerdo do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The width of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A largura do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The height of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A altura do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> class with the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> com o local e o tamanho especificados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Intersect%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IsEmpty%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IntersectsWith%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Intersect%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IsEmpty%2A>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IntersectsWith%2A> membros.

trans-unit.source: This example should be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo deve ser usado com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste this code into a form and call this method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Cole este código em um formulário e chamar este método quando lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the y-coordinate that is the sum of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height" /> property values of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada y que é a soma dos valores da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height" /> desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate that is the sum of <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y que é a soma de <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height" /> deste <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Bottom%2A> property represents the y-coordinate of the first point at the bottom edge of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> that is not contained in the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Bottom%2A> propriedade representa a coordenada y do primeiro ponto na borda inferior do <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> que não está contido no <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure to be converted.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> a ser convertida.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure by rounding the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> values to the next higher integer values.
trans-unit.target: Converte a estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> especificada em uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> arredondando os valores <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> para os próximos valores inteiros mais altos.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified point is contained within the rectangular region defined by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o ponto especificado está contido dentro da região retangular definida por este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified point is contained within this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o ponto especificado está contido nessa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if the point represented by <paramref name="pt" /> is contained within this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retorna <see langword="true" /> se o ponto representado por <paramref name="pt" /> está contido nessa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The containing rectangle must be normalized for this method to return accurate results.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo que contém deverão ser normalizado para este método retornar resultados precisos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the rectangular region represented by <paramref name="rect" /> is entirely contained within this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a região retangular representada por <paramref name="rect" /> está inteiramente contida dentro desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if the rectangular region represented by <paramref name="rect" /> is entirely contained within this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método retornará <see langword="true" /> se a região retangular representada por <paramref name="rect" /> estiver inteiramente contida dentro desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The containing rectangle must be normalized for this method to return accurate results.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo que contém deverão ser normalizado para este método retornar resultados precisos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Contains%2A> method and the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Contains%2A> método e o <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed for use with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para uso com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste this code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`, call `DrawFirstRectangle` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> method, and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Cole este código em um formulário que contém um botão chamado `Button1`, chame `DrawFirstRectangle` do construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> método e associar o `Button1_Click` método com o botão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the point to test.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada X do ponto a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the point to test.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada Y do ponto a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified point is contained within this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o ponto especificado está contido nessa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if the point defined by <paramref name="x" /> and <paramref name="y" /> is contained within this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método retornará <see langword="true" /> se o ponto definido por <paramref name="x" /> e <paramref name="y" /> estiver contido dentro desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The containing rectangle must be normalized for this method to return accurate results.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo que contém deverão ser normalizado para este método retornar resultados precisos.

trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure with its properties left uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> com suas propriedades mantidas com a inicialização cancelada.

trans-unit.source: A rectangle is defined by its width, height and upper-left corner.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo é definido pela largura, altura e canto superior esquerdo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether <paramref name="obj" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure with the same location and size of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Testa se <paramref name="obj" /> é uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> com o mesmo local e tamanho desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure and its <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width" />, and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height" /> properties are equal to the corresponding properties of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método retornará <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="obj" /> for uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> e suas propriedades <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height" /> forem iguais às propriedades correspondentes desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada X do canto superior esquerdo da estrutura de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada Y do canto superior esquerdo dessa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada X do canto inferior direito dessa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada Y do canto inferior direito dessa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure with the specified edge locations.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> com os locais de borda especificados.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: O novo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> criado por esse método.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> with the specified upper-left and lower-right corners.
trans-unit.target: Esse método cria um <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> com os cantos superior esquerdo e direito inferior especificados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a rectangle using the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.FromLTRB%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um retângulo usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.FromLTRB%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste this code into a form and call the `CreateARectangleFromLTRB` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Cole este código em um formulário e a chamada a `CreateARectangleFromLTRB` método ao lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para esta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: For information about the use of hash codes, see <see cref="M:System.Object.GetHashCode" /> .
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o uso de códigos hash, consulte <see cref="M:System.Object.GetHashCode" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the hash code for this rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o código hash para esse retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The height of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: A altura desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height%2A> property will also cause a change in the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Bottom%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: Alterando o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height%2A> propriedade também fará com que uma alteração no <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Bottom%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.

trans-unit.source: The units the rectangle is drawn in is determined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> properties of the graphics object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: As unidades que o retângulo é desenhado em é determinado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> propriedades dos gráficos de objeto usado para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The default unit is pixels.
trans-unit.target: A unidade padrão é pixels.

trans-unit.source: Enlarges a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Amplia uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The amount to inflate this rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O valor para inflar esse retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Enlarges this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Amplia esse <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> de acordo com o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method enlarges this rectangle, not a copy of it.
trans-unit.target: Esse método aumenta esse retângulo, não uma cópia dele.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo é ampliado em ambas as direções ao longo do eixo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um retângulo 50 por 50 é ampliado por 50 no eixo x, o retângulo resultante será 150 unidades longo (o original 50, 50 na direção menos e 50 na direção adição) manter centro Geométrico do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir foi projetado para uso com o Windows Forms e requer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`, que é um parâmetro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The code creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> and enlarges it by 50 units in both axes.
trans-unit.target: O código cria um <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> e ele aumenta 50 unidades por ambos os eixos.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is drawn to screen before inflation (black) and after inflation (red).
trans-unit.target: O retângulo à tela antes inflação (preto) e depois inflação (vermelho).

trans-unit.source: The amount to inflate this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> horizontally.
trans-unit.target: O valor para inflar esse <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> horizontalmente.

trans-unit.source: The amount to inflate this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> vertically.
trans-unit.target: O valor para inflar esse <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: Enlarges this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Amplia esse <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> de acordo com o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method enlarges this rectangle, not a copy of it.
trans-unit.target: Esse método aumenta esse retângulo, não uma cópia dele.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo é ampliado em ambas as direções ao longo do eixo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um retângulo 50 por 50 é ampliado por 50 no eixo x, o retângulo resultante será 150 unidades longo (o original 50, 50 na direção menos e 50 na direção adição) manter centro Geométrico do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: If either `x` or `y` is negative, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> structure is deflated in the corresponding direction.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer um dos `x` ou `y` for negativo, o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> estrutura está vazio na direção correspondente.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> structure and enlarges it by 100 units in the x-axis direction:
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> estrutura e aumenta-100 unidades na direção do eixo x:

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> with which to start.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> com o qual começar.

trans-unit.source: This rectangle is not modified.
trans-unit.target: Este retângulo não é modificado.

trans-unit.source: The amount to inflate this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> horizontally.
trans-unit.target: O valor para inflar esse <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> horizontalmente.

trans-unit.source: The amount to inflate this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> vertically.
trans-unit.target: O valor para inflar esse <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an enlarged copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Cria e retorna uma cópia ampliada da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The copy is enlarged by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: A cópia é ampliada segundo o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The original <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure remains unmodified.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> original permanece inalterada.

trans-unit.source: The enlarged <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> ampliado.

trans-unit.source: This method makes a copy of `rect`, enlarges the copy, and then returns the enlarged copy.
trans-unit.target: Este método faz uma cópia do `rect`, aumenta a cópia e, em seguida, retorna a cópia ampliada.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo é ampliado em ambas as direções ao longo do eixo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um retângulo 50 por 50 é ampliado por 50 no eixo x, o retângulo resultante será 150 unidades longo (o original 50, 50 na direção menos e 50 na direção adição) manter centro Geométrico do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir foi projetado para uso com o Windows Forms e requer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`, que é um parâmetro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The code creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> and enlarges it by 50 units in both axes.
trans-unit.target: O código cria um <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> e ele aumenta 50 unidades por ambos os eixos.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the resulting rectangle (red) is 150 units in both axes.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o retângulo resultante (vermelho) é 150 unidades em ambos os eixos.

trans-unit.source: Determines the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that represents the intersection of two rectangles.
trans-unit.target: Determina a estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa a interseção de dois retângulos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> with which to intersect.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> com o qual fazer a interseção.

trans-unit.source: Replaces this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> with the intersection of itself and the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: Substitui este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> com a interseção de si mesmo e o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Intersect%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IsEmpty%2A> and the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IntersectsWith%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Intersect%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IsEmpty%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IntersectsWith%2A> membros.

trans-unit.source: This example should be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo deve ser usado com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste this code into a form and call this method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Cole este código em um formulário e chamar este método quando lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: A rectangle to intersect.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo a fazer interseção.

trans-unit.source: A rectangle to intersect.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo a fazer interseção.

trans-unit.source: Returns a third <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that represents the intersection of two other <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma terceira estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa a interseção de duas outras estruturas <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: If there is no intersection, an empty <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma interseção, um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> vazio será retornado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the intersection of <paramref name="a" /> and <paramref name="b" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa a interseção de <paramref name="a" /> e <paramref name="b" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Intersect%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IsEmpty%2A> and the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IntersectsWith%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Intersect%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IsEmpty%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IntersectsWith%2A> membros.

trans-unit.source: This example should be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo deve ser usado com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste this code into a form and call this method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Cole este código em um formulário e chamar este método quando lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle to test.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: Determines if this rectangle intersects with <paramref name="rect" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se esse retângulo faz interseção com <paramref name="rect" />.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if there is any intersection, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retorna <see langword="true" /> se houver alguma interseção, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Intersect%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IsEmpty%2A> and the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IntersectsWith%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Intersect%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IsEmpty%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IntersectsWith%2A> membros.

trans-unit.source: This example should be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo deve ser usado com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste this code into a form and call this method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Cole este código em um formulário e chamar este método quando lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether all numeric properties of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> have values of zero.
trans-unit.target: Testa se todas as propriedades numéricas deste <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> têm valores de zero.

trans-unit.source: This property returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X" />, and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y" /> properties of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> all have values of zero; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade retorna <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X" />, e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y" /> propriedades desse <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> todos têm valores de zero; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Intersect%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IsEmpty%2A> and the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IntersectsWith%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Intersect%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IsEmpty%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IntersectsWith%2A> membros.

trans-unit.source: This example should be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo deve ser usado com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste this code into a form and call this method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Cole este código em um formulário e chamar este método quando lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the x-coordinate of the left edge of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada X da borda superior esquerda desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the left edge of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada X da borda superior esquerda desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the coordinates of the upper-left corner of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as coordenadas do canto superior esquerdo desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the upper-left corner of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que representa o canto superior esquerdo desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the location of this rectangle by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta o local desse retângulo pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: Amount to offset the location.
trans-unit.target: O valor para deslocar o local.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the location of this rectangle by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta o local desse retângulo pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method adjusts the location of the upper-left corner horizontally by the x-coordinate of the specified point, and vertically by the y-coordinate of the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Este método ajusta horizontalmente o local do canto superior esquerdo, a coordenada x do ponto especificado e verticalmente a coordenada y do ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Contains%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Offset%2A> methods and the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Contains%2A>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Offset%2A> métodos e <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed for use with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para uso com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste this code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`, call `DrawFirstRectangle` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> method, and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Cole este código em um formulário que contém um botão chamado `Button1`, chame `DrawFirstRectangle` do construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> método e associar o `Button1_Click` método com o botão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento horizontal.

trans-unit.source: The vertical offset.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento vertical.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the location of this rectangle by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta o local desse retângulo pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that is to the left of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que está à esquerda do operador de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that is to the right of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que está à direita do operador de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structures have equal location and size.
trans-unit.target: Testa se duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> têm local e tamanho iguais.

trans-unit.source: This operator returns <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structures have equal <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width" />, and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: Esse operador retornará <see langword="true" /> se as duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> tiverem as propriedades <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height" /> iguais.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that is to the left of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> está à esquerda do operador de desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that is to the right of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> está à direita do operador de desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structures differ in location or size.
trans-unit.target: Testa se duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> diferem no local ou no tamanho.

trans-unit.source: This operator returns <see langword="true" /> if any of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height" /> properties of the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structures are unequal; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Esse operador retornará <see langword="true" /> se qualquer uma das propriedades <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height" /> das duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> forem diferentes; caso contrário <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the x-coordinate that is the sum of <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width" /> property values of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada X que é a soma dos valores da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width" /> desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate that is the sum of <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada X que é a soma de <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width" /> deste <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Right%2A> property represents the x-coordinate of the first point at the right edge of the rectangle that is not contained in the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Right%2A> propriedade representa a coordenada x do primeiro ponto na borda direita do retângulo que não está contido no retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> to be converted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> by rounding the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> values to the nearest integer values.
trans-unit.target: Converte o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> especificado em um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, arredondando os valores <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> para os valores de inteiro mais próximos.

trans-unit.source: The rounded interger value of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor do inteiro <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> arredondado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Round%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Truncate%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Round%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Truncate%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed for use with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para uso com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste this code into a form and call the `RoundingAndTruncatingRectangles` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Cole este código em um formulário e a chamada a `RoundingAndTruncatingRectangles` método ao lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho desse <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the width and height of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa a largura e altura desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the y-coordinate of the top edge of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada y da borda superior dessa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the top edge of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y da borda superior dessa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts the attributes of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to a human-readable string.
trans-unit.target: Converte os atributos deste <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> em uma cadeia de caracteres legível por humanos.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the position, width, and height of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure ¾ for example, {X=20, Y=20, Width=100, Height=50}
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a posição, largura e altura desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> ¾ por exemplo, {X= 20, Y= 20, Largura= 100, Altura= 50}

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> to be converted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> by truncating the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Converte o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> especificado como um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> truncando os valores <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" />.

trans-unit.source: The truncated value of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor truncado do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Round%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Truncate%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Round%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Truncate%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed for use with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para uso com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste this code into a form and call the `RoundingAndTruncatingRectangles` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Cole este código em um formulário e a chamada a `RoundingAndTruncatingRectangles` método ao lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: A rectangle to union.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo a se unir.

trans-unit.source: A rectangle to union.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo a se unir.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that contains the union of two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que contém a união de duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that bounds the union of the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que associa a união de duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: When one of the two rectangles is empty, meaning all of its values are zero, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Union%2A> method returns a rectangle with a starting point of (0, 0), and the height and width of the non-empty rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Quando um dos dois retângulos estiver vazio, o que significa que todos os seus valores são zero, o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Union%2A> método retorna um retângulo com um ponto de partida de (0, 0) e a altura e a largura do retângulo não vazio.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have two rectangles: A = (0, 0; 0, 0) and B = (1, 1; 2, 2), then the union of A and B is (0, 0; 2, 2).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você tiver dois retângulos: A = (0, 0; 0, 0) e B = (1, 1; 2, 2), em seguida, a união de A e B é (0, 0; 2, 2).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Union%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Union%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed for use with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para uso com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste this code into a form and call the `ShowRectangleUnion` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Cole este código em um formulário e a chamada a `ShowRectangleUnion` método ao lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The width of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: A largura dessa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width%2A> property will also cause a change in the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Right%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: Alterando o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width%2A> propriedade também fará com que uma alteração no <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Right%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.

trans-unit.source: The units the rectangle is drawn in is determined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> properties of the graphics object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: As unidades que o retângulo é desenhado em é determinado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> propriedades dos gráficos de objeto usado para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The default unit is pixels.
trans-unit.target: A unidade padrão é pixels.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada X do canto superior esquerdo da estrutura de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada X do canto superior esquerdo da estrutura de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X%2A> property will also cause a change in the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Right%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: Alterando o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X%2A> propriedade também fará com que uma alteração no <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Right%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada Y do canto superior esquerdo desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada Y do canto superior esquerdo dessa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y%2A> property will also cause a change in the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Bottom%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: Alterando o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y%2A> propriedade também fará com que uma alteração no <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Bottom%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
